LanguageData.VPE_EltexGear.label: eltex gear
LanguageData.VPE_EltexGear.description: Tailor and craft complex eltex apparel, capable of improving the mana of your mages, as well as an arcanium-infused staff.
LanguageData.VPE_CasterGear.label: mage gear
LanguageData.VPE_CasterGear.description: Craft simple mage apparel, armor and gear using arcanium.
